nodes.text: A painting depicted an artist's photo-realistic rendition of a star emerging from behind a planet, executed in a palette of blues. The work was unique and no longer in circulation at some point after the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War, when its only copy was owned by Sean Trenwell. He awarded the painting to a spacer who assisted him during his time as the mayor of the city of Bestine on the planet Tatooine.

This painting appears in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies. It is a reward from a quest tasked to the player by Sean Trenwell after Trenwell has won the Bestine mayoral election. In the game, it is named only A Painting and can be used in the player character's home as decoration. Although the game suggests the painting is one of a kind, multiple players may own copies of it.
